typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Mese dell'anno} as string,
		{Giorno della settimana} as string,
		Servizio as string,
		Giorno as string,
		{Campagna di uscita Chiamata} as string,
		{Fascia 60'} as string,
		{Numero chiamante} as string,
		Settimana as string,
		Offerte as string,
		Completate as string,
		Servite as string,
		{Servite e Completate} as string,
		{Servite Subito} as string,
		Accodate as string,
		{Accodate 0-10} as string,
		{Accodate 10-20} as string,
		{Accodate 20-30} as string,
		{Accodate 30-40} as string,
		{Accodate 40-50} as string,
		{Accodate 50-60} as string,
		{Accodate 60-120} as string,
		{Accodate 120-180} as string,
		{Accodate 180-240} as string,
		{Accodate oltre 240} as string,
		{Completate (abbandonata) in coda} as string,
		{Abb. in coda 0-10} as string,
		{Abb. in coda 10-20} as string,
		{Abb. in coda 20-30} as string,
		{Abb. in coda 30-40} as string,
		{Abb. in coda 40-50} as string,
		{Abb. in coda 50-60} as string,
		{Abb. in coda 60-120} as string,
		{Abb. in coda 120-180} as string,
		{Abb. in coda 180-240} as string,
		{Tempo di coda Secs} as string,
		{Tempo di conversazione Chiamata} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	moveFiles: ['SampleSisal.xlsx','backup\sampleSisal.xlsx'],
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'excel',
	container: 'importazione',
	fileName: 'Report Inbound_SisalPay B2C.xlsx',
	sheetName: 'Base Dati',
	firstRowAsHeader: true,
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	preferredIntegralType: 'long') ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		DfReportInboundB2cDetailsId as long,
		DfReportInboundB2cFileId as string,
		Mese as string,
		GiornoSettimana as string,
		Servizio as string,
		Giorno as date,
		Campagna as string,
		FasciaOraria as string,
		NumeroChiamante as string,
		Settimana as string,
		Offerte as integer,
		Completate as integer,
		Servite as integer,
		ServiteCompletate as integer,
		ServiteSubito as integer,
		Accodate as integer,
		Accodate_0_10 as integer,
		Accodate_10_20 as integer,
		Accodate_20_30 as integer,
		Accodate_30_40 as integer,
		Accodate_40_50 as integer,
		Accodate_50_60 as integer,
		Accodate_60_120 as integer,
		Accodate_120_180 as integer,
		Accodate_180_240 as integer,
		Accodate_Oltre_240 as integer,
		CompletateAbbandonataInCoda as integer,
		AbbInCoda_0_10 as integer,
		AbbInCoda_10_20 as integer,
		AbbInCoda_20_30 as integer,
		AbbInCoda_30_40 as integer,
		AbbInCoda_40_50 as integer,
		AbbInCoda_50_60 as integer,
		AbbInCoda_60_120 as integer,
		AbbInCoda_120_180 as integer,
		AbbInCoda_180_240 as integer,
		TempoDiCodaSecs as integer,
		TempoDiConversazioneChiamata as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Mese = {Mese dell'anno},
		GiornoSettimana = {Giorno della settimana},
		Servizio,
		Giorno,
		Campagna = {Campagna di uscita Chiamata},
		FasciaOraria = {Fascia 60'},
		NumeroChiamante = {Numero chiamante},
		Settimana,
		Offerte,
		Completate,
		Servite,
		ServiteCompletate = {Servite e Completate},
		ServiteSubito = {Servite Subito},
		Accodate,
		Accodate_0_10 = {Accodate 0-10},
		Accodate_10_20 = {Accodate 10-20},
		Accodate_20_30 = {Accodate 20-30},
		Accodate_30_40 = {Accodate 30-40},
		Accodate_40_50 = {Accodate 40-50},
		Accodate_50_60 = {Accodate 50-60},
		Accodate_60_120 = {Accodate 60-120},
		Accodate_120_180 = {Accodate 120-180},
		Accodate_180_240 = {Accodate 180-240},
		Accodate_Oltre_240 = {Accodate oltre 240},
		CompletateAbbandonataInCoda = {Completate (abbandonata) in coda},
		AbbInCoda_0_10 = {Abb. in coda 0-10},
		AbbInCoda_10_20 = {Abb. in coda 10-20},
		AbbInCoda_20_30 = {Abb. in coda 20-30},
		AbbInCoda_30_40 = {Abb. in coda 30-40},
		AbbInCoda_40_50 = {Abb. in coda 40-50},
		AbbInCoda_50_60 = {Abb. in coda 50-60},
		AbbInCoda_60_120 = {Abb. in coda 60-120},
		AbbInCoda_120_180 = {Abb. in coda 120-180},
		AbbInCoda_180_240 = {Abb. in coda 180-240},
		TempoDiCodaSecs = {Tempo di coda Secs},
		TempoDiConversazioneChiamata = {Tempo di coda Secs}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
